Ouma (nke a na-akpọkarị Ouma Rusks) bụ rusk ndị South Africa nke e ji usoro nri mmiri ara ehi ọdịnala mee

Elizabeth Ann Greyvenstyn mepụtara ya na mbụ n'ime ime obodo nke Molteno, na Eastern Cape, na afọ 1939, na nzaghachi maka atụmatụ nke onye ụkọchukwu obodo ahụ iji nyere aka na mbọ ọchụnta ego nke ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ọgbakọ ya. Akara ahụ na-achịkwa obere ahịa rusk dị n'ógbè ahụ ugbu a, a na-arụkwa ya n'otu obodo ahụ e mepụtara ya na mbụ.

Na mgbalị iji belata mmetụta ọjọọ nke Great Depression, onye ụkọchukwu obodo ahụ nyere nwanyị ọ bụla nọ n'ọgbakọ ya ego iji malite azụmaahịa mpaghara ma mụbaa ego ezinụlọ ha. Onye ọ bụla n'ime ha nwetara ọkara okpueze, nke ya na shilling abụọ na sixpence (ihe ruru £ 30 ma ọ bụ R520 na 2016).
E bu ụzọ ree ha n'okpuru aha "Outspan Rusks" mana a gbanwere ya n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ bụrụ 'Ouma' (Afrikaans maka nne nne).

N'afọ 1941, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị (South Africa) nyere Ouma Rusks ego mbụ ya maka £ 1,500. Nwa nwa Elizabeth, Leon Greyvensteyn, onye tinyere aka na nguzobe na njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, gara n'ihu ruo ụlọ ọrụ Simba Chip na afọ 1956.

Ouma ghọrọ akụkụ nke Fedfood na afọ 1970 ha, ma kemgbe afọ 1992 ọ bụ Foodcorp (South Africa) nwe ya. Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2012, Foodcorp ka na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ Ouma Rusks n'obodo Molteno na-ewe mmadụ 250 n'ọrụ.
Ụlọ ọrụ Ouma dị na Molteno bụ onye ọrụ kachasị ukwuu n'obodo ahụ ugbu a, nwere ndị ọrụ 250.
Okwu mgbasa ozi nke Ouma Rusk bụ nke a maara nke ọma na South Afrịka.
